combobox.name: cbBuff_AABattleCry
combobox.Width:
100 20 The Group Member to Buff Battle Cry
Text
if (${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[Buff_AABattleCry](exists)}) { This:AddItem[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[Buff_AABattleCry]}] This.ItemByText[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[Buff_AABattleCry]}]:Select } else { This:AddItem["No one"] This.ItemByText["No one"]:Select }
LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}]:AddSetting[Buff_AABattleCry,${This.SelectedItem.Text}] Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:Save_Settings
Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:RefreshList[${This.FullName},Buff_AABattleCry,0,1,0]

combobox.name: cbBuffHateGroupMember
combobox.Width:
100 20 The Group Member to Hate Buff
This:AddItem[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[BuffHateGroupMember]}] This.ItemByText[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[BuffHateGroupMember]}]:Select
LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}]:AddSetting[BuffHateGroupMember,${This.SelectedItem.Text}] Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:Save_Settings
Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:RefreshList[${This.FullName},BuffHateGroupMember,1,1,0,0,0]
